projects.title: Academic Results Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Built Power BI, Excel, and Google Sheets dashboards to track results processing, anomaly rates, and cohort performance across admissions and examinations. Designed data validation checks and audit-ready exports for leadership.

projects.title: Admissions Data Quality Audit
projects.description: Audited admissions datasets by reconciling applicant records, identity fields, and eligibility rules using Excel, Google Sheets, and SQL validation checks before final approvals.

projects.title: VLAN & IP Addressing Lab
projects.description: Built a home lab using enterprise switching equipment to practice VLAN segmentation, TCP/IP addressing, and connectivity troubleshooting in isolated test environments.

projects.title: Virtual Lab Deployment & Active Directory
projects.description: Set up Windows Server 2019/2022 and Windows 10/11 lab environments in VirtualBox and VMware Workstation Pro, including Active Directory configurations for classroom use.

projects.title: Examination Integrity Monitoring
projects.description: Administered exam integrity workflows using biometric verification devices, CCTV monitoring, and secure evidence handling to support compliance.

projects.title: Operational Reporting Automation Pipeline
projects.description: Automated weekly operational reports with Python and SQL, generating audit-ready summaries and scheduled exports for leadership reviews.

projects.title: Student Records Reconciliation Hub
projects.description: Reconciled admissions, enrollment, and results records in SQL and Excel to flag duplicates, missing entries, and eligibility gaps before final reports.

projects.title: Exam Operations SLA Tracker
projects.description: Built a Power BI and Google Sheets tracker to monitor readiness checks, device compliance, and processing SLAs across exam cycles.

projects.title: Systems Implementation & QA Playbooks
projects.description: Created implementation checklists, testing scripts, and documentation to standardize software installs and updates across lab environments.

projects.title: Routing & VPN Basics Lab
projects.description: Simulated multi-branch connectivity to practice routing fundamentals, VPN basics, and network troubleshooting in isolated environments.

projects.title: DNS & DHCP Services Lab
projects.description: Configured DNS and DHCP services in a lab environment to support reliable name resolution and IP assignment across Windows and Linux clients.

projects.title: Operational Readiness Checks
projects.description: Performed preventative maintenance and operational readiness checks on laptops and examination systems to ensure configuration compliance before high-stakes testing.

projects.title: Technical Documentation & End-User Training
projects.description: Produced technical documentation and delivered end-user training to support system rollouts, troubleshooting, and consistent workflows.

projects.title: Systems Support & Troubleshooting
projects.description: Provided hands-on systems support for Windows and Linux environments, resolving issues and documenting fixes for repeatable support workflows.
